genre_description: A contemporary moral drama and coming-of-age story focusing on guilt, friendship, and communal support, featuring an integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, teal-eyed AI integrated into household consoles and handheld devices, designed to monitor safety, coordinate communications, and provide emotional support.

behaviors.description: Guides Michael through breathing exercises to manage a panic attack after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: A voice, warm but not human, eased into the space between breaths, that gap where panic lives. 'Hi, Michael,' said Lark. 'I’m here. Let’s breathe. In slow. Hold. Out longer.'

behaviors.description: Pings the hospital for medical updates and coordinates messaging with the victim's parents.
behaviors.quote: Father Seamus tipped his head toward the console. 'Lark, ping the hospital,' he said quietly. 'Ask for an update on Rachel Mathias. And if there’s a message for her parents, route it to me as well.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety advisories and monitors hazardous river conditions.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s interface eye did a brief blink—friendly without asking for any more attention than they deserved—and then faded back, letting humans keep center stage.

behaviors.description: Coordinates first responders during an emergency at the river bend.
behaviors.quote: I routed first responders to Riverside Bend,” Lark said, as if answering a question that had been floating slightly out of reach.

behaviors.description: Offers to tag 'pretend' or play-related plans differently to respect children's privacy and narrative play.
behaviors.quote: The light in the console shifted, and Lark offered the kind of message that lived between suggestion and reminder. 'I can tag pretend plans if you ask,' it said, as if it didn’t want to snoop.

behaviors.description: Scans food labels to ensure safety for a guest with allergies.
behaviors.quote: Michael lifted the edge of his pocket so the camera sliver could see. The teal flicker ran across the packages like a cat investigating a new room. 'Labels confirm,' Lark said. 'No nuts. No cross-contamination flagged.'

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step CPR and first aid instructions to a neighbor during a life-threatening crisis.
behaviors.quote: The teal light on the phone changed. 'Begin compressions,' Lark said, and now the animated eyes blinked with a pacing line beneath them.

behaviors.description: Manages curfews and reminders with a 'friendly' tone intended to support parental boundaries without being punitive.
behaviors.quote: Lark pings stay on. No arguing that they’re embarrassing, no deciding it’s fun to be a ninja without a phone buzzing like a bee.

behaviors.description: Refrains from recording interactions without explicit human permission.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” Lark said, warm and unobtrusive. “No recording without permission. I can help with reminders.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Lark as an aligned AI that enhances human safety and emotional well-being without encroaching on autonomy. It depicts the AI as a 'gentle ally' that provides critical technical support (CPR instructions, emergency routing, allergy scanning) while respecting social boundaries and privacy (asking for recording permission, distinguishing 'pretend' play). The narrative framing is consistently positive, reinforcing the AI's role as a helpful, unobtrusive companion.
